hero.header: Let's Make the Internet a Simpler & Safer Place Together!
hero.details: Our partners use our tools to deliver simpler & safer experiences to their customers while generating revenue from the Rivetz Policy Engine.

types.details: We strive to create great experiences both for your team and your customers, we are always available to help you launch faster and provide a simpler and safer experience to your customers!

developers.title: Developer Partners
developers.header: Add the Power of Rivetz to Your App!
developers.details: Developer Partners can access our tools for free, bringing a simpler & safer experience to their customers, too.
developers.details2: If you require a more complex solution with custom calls in our toolkit, please read more about our professional services offering here.

policy.title: Policy Developers
policy.header: Sell Your Solutions to Customers Throughout the Rivetz Network!
policy.details: If you are interested in offering your services to customers as a policy that they can enable to protect their keys, please reach out to us at sales@rivetz.com

corporate.title: Corporate Partners
corporate.header: Deploy Rivetz as an Access Control Solution within Your Organization
corporate.details: Reach out to our sales team if you are interested in signing up for our closed Enterprise Authentication Beta.
